#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<cctype>
#include<ciso646>
#include<stdbool.h>
#include<cstddef>
#include<vector>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<list>
#include<algorithm>
#include<complex>
#include<functional>
#include<numeric>
#include<limits>
#include<stdexcept>
#include<string>
#include<utility>
		/*--------scan/print--------*/
# define s(n) scanf("%d",&n)
# define sf(x) scanf("%f\n",&x)
# define slf(x) scanf("%lf\n",&x)
# define sln(n) scanf("%d\n",&n)
# define slld(x) scanf("%lld\n",&x)
# define p(n) printf("%d",n)
# define pf(x) printf("%f\n",x)
# define plf(x) printf("%lf\n",x)
# define pln(n) printf("%d\n",n)
# define plld(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
# define debug(x) printf("\nError could be here %d\n",x)
		/*--------FOR LOOPS--------*/
# define For(I,l,m) for(int I=l;I<=m;I++)
# define NFor(I,l,m) for(int I=l;I>=m;I--)
# define ForInt(I,l,m) for(I=l;I<=m;I++)
# define NForInt(I,l,m) for(I=l;I>=m;I--)
# define FORVEC(IT,A) for(int IT=0; IT<A.size();IT++)
# define FOR(VEC,IT,A,s,e) for(VEC::iterator IT=A.begin()+s; IT!=A.begin()+e+1;++IT)
# define FORALL(VEC,IT,A) for(VEC::iterator IT=A.begin(); IT!=A.end();++IT)
		/*--------others--------*/
# define TEST int t; scanf("%d",&t); while(t--)
# define NEWLINE printf("\n")
# define INF 1000001000
# define CX real()
# define CY imag()
# define PX first
# define PY second
# define PB push_back
# define MP make_pair
# define SORTALL(A) sort(A.begin(),A.end())
# define REVERSE(A) reverse(A.begin(),A.end())
# define SORTARR(A,l,m) sort(A+l,A+m+1)
		/*--------2 option--------*/
# define YES printf("YES\n")
# define NO printf("NO\n")
		/*--------inp/out--------*/
# define READ(file) freopen("file", "rt", stdin)
# define WRITE(file) freopen("file", "wt", stdout);

const double PI = 3.1415926535897932384626433832795;

using namespace std;

typedef vector<int> vi;
typedef complex<int> comi;
typedef pair<int, int> pii;
typedef map<int, int> mii;
typedef vector<double> vf;
typedef complex<double> comf;
typedef pair<double, double> pff;

		/*-------begin of main---------*/

int main()
{
	int n,q;
	s(n);s(q);
	int A[n+3];
	For(i,1,n)
		s(A[i]);
	int cnt[105][n+3];
	For(i,1,100)
		cnt[i][0]=0;	
	For(k,1,100)
		For(i,1,n)
		{
			cnt[k][i]=cnt[k][i-1];
			if(A[i]==k)
				cnt[k][i]++;
		}
	while(q--)
	{
		int x,y;
		s(x);s(y);
		int ctr=0;
		For(i,1,100)
		{
			if(cnt[i][y]-cnt[i][x-1]!= 0)
				ctr++;
		}
		pln(ctr);
	}
}
